boost::logging::filter::no_ts

boost::logging::filter::no_ts Struct Reference

Manages is_enabled/set_enabled in a non-thread-safe way. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Manages is_enabled/set_enabled in a non-thread-safe way.

If you change set_enabled() while program is running, it can take a bit to propagate between threads. Most of the time, this should be acceptable.

Examples:

custom_fmt_dest.cpp, ded_loger_one_filter.cpp, fastest_no_ostr_like.cpp, fastest_use_ostr_like.cpp, mul_loggers_one_filter.cpp, no_levels_with_route.cpp, one_loger_one_filter.cpp, ts_loger_one_filter.cpp, use_profiler.cpp, and use_tss_ostringstream.cpp.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
